<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Acid Strongbox Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=115)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 60</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

An invisible magic field around the strongbox releases a spray of acid when disturbed.

---

**Stealth**
DC 22 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 22 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) to harmlessly bleed away the magical field or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (2nd level; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC 20) to dispel it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Acidic Spray** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) **Trigger** A creature touches the strongbox directly or with a held tool; **Effect** The trap deals 4d8+10 acid damage in a 15-foot cone in the direction of the triggering creature (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
name: Acid Strongbox Trap
